meta.description: A playful, tactile task organization and productivity application with a focus on high-contrast visuals and 3D interactions.
meta.designDirectorNotes: The design should feel 'alive' and 'physical'. Use 3D flips for state changes rather than simple fades. Colors should be bold and high-contrast. The interface is split into two main 'faces' (Task View and Pomodoro View) that physically flip to reveal each other.
meta.detailed project: The project is a task organisation and productivity application. There are two containers, one for the front and one for the back. If the user clicks on the start countdown timer, the front container flips to reveal a pomodoro app. There are icons at the bottom of the pomodoro app that play focus and relaxing audio looped sounds. Users can quickly add a new task using keyboard shortucts (CTRL+SHIFT+A) to enter the new task's title. A new task card is added to the Ice Box section and (TODO: the input box for the task is activated so the user can type the task detail directly into the card. The user then hits CTRL+ENTER) and the task is added. Tasks can be dragged between four sections: High-Impact, Low Impact, Delegate, and Ice Box. Each task is a card that can is flipped using CSS animation to reveal a form with Due date, comma separated project tags, and (TODO: Date added). At the bottom of the main container are icons for 1. Upload 2. Download in JSON or CSV format, 3. Turn on background animation, 4. TODO: Show a report with pending tasks 5. TODO: Display a settings page to enable the user to customise the application. If the user presses SHIFT+/ a modal pop-up is displayed with keyboard shortcuts.

designPrinciples.name: Tactile Materiality
designPrinciples.description: Elements should feel like physical objects. Use 3D transforms, shadows, and flip animations to convey depth and substance.

designPrinciples.name: High Contrast & Playful
designPrinciples.description: Use a dark, immersive background contrasted with bright, solid colors for containers and text. The aesthetic is functional but energetic.

designPrinciples.name: Focus-Driven
designPrinciples.description: The interface adapts to the user's mode (Planning vs. Doing). The Pomodoro mode is distinct and immersive (black background, golden text).
